document.full_text: los angeles dodgers starting pitcher jon garland will be sidelined from four to six weeks with a strained oblique muscle, the national league team said on thursday.
document.title: dodgers pitcher garland sidelined four to six weeks
lines_and_colors: los angeles dodgers starting pitcher jon garland will be sidelined from four to six weeks with a strained oblique muscle, the national league team said on thursday.
